title: Plume debuts tokenized ‘Mineral Vault’ amid hunger for RWA yield, CEO says
author: by Alex O’Donnell
description: According to Chris Yin, investor demand for RWAs is moving “upstream” from tokenized treasury bills to private alternative assets.

title: Libre launches Brevan Howard, BlackRock, Hamilton Lane funds on Aptos
author: by Ana Paula Pereira
description: After Solana and Near, Libre protocol is deploying its pool of tokenized funds on the Aptos blockchain.

title: Blockstream Mining issues hashrate-backed security token in fundraise
author: by Alex O’Donnell
description: Blockstream is essentially selling four-year claims on the proceeds from its Bitcoin mining operations in exchange for funding.

title: Here’s why transparent RWA oracles are key to bringing trillions onchain
author: by Niklas Kunkel
description: The growth of tokenized real-world assets is fueling institutional interest in DeFi, with oracles key to ensuring transparency and security.

title: $1.3T in tokenized RWAs by 2030 more likely than $30T — Analyst
author: by Ciaran Lyons
description: One analyst says a Wall Street forecast may be overestimating the amount of money that could flow into tokenized real-world assets by 2030.

title: Ondo’s USDY yield coin expands to Arbitrum
author: by Alex O’Donnell
description: Tokenized treasury products are gaining widespread adoption on blockchain networks.

title: Is it time for Avalanche (AVAX) price to turn bullish?
author: by Big Smokey
description: Avalanche price gained 16%+ in the last week, but are positive media headlines enough to sustain the AVAX rally?

title: Grayscale launches investment fund for AVAX token
author: by Alex O’Donnell
description: It joins Grayscale’s suite of more than 20 crypto investment products.

title: Tokenized RWAs are ’a $30-trillion opportunity’ — Polygon exec
author: by Alex O’Donnell
description: High-net-worth individuals and private equity funds will drive adoption, said Colin Butler.

title: Nigerian state plans to tokenize real estate, boost revenue
author: by Amaka Nwaokocha
description: The tokenization of real estate in Lagos State has the potential to transform the property market, making it more accessible to a wider range of investors.

title: Real-world tokenization can drive homeownership — Quarter Homes CEO
author: by Vince Quill
description: Current 30-year fixed mortgage rates in the United States are close to 7%, as younger individuals struggle to purchase property.

title: BlackRock's tokenized BUIDL fund has paid $7M in dividends since March
author: by Vince Quill
description: According to researcher Tom Wan, tokenized United States Treasury funds could see $3 billion in capital investment by the end of 2024.

title: Slovenia launches EU's first digital sovereign bond via BNP Paribas
author: by Derek Andersen
description: The bond was issued as part of ECB wholesale settlements experiments and matures on Nov. 25.

title: Exclusive: Franklin Templeton mulls bringing RWAs to Ethereum, user-managed wallets
author: by Alex O’Donnell
description: The asset manager is considering expanding tokenized securities to the Ethereum mainnet and other EVMs, its digital assets head told Cointelegraph.

title: Real-world assets evolve finance by tokenizing everything, says Kinto co-founder
author: by Ray Salmond
description: Real-world assets could catalyze the tokenization of everything, or at least Kinto thinks so.
